events.message: I would like to request a refund for the shoes I bought last week because they do not fit as expected and I am very disappointed.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to customer dissatisfaction with product fit and desire for money back.
Customer support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle this refund case and will reach out shortly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the shoes you purchased.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the shoes have been used or damaged in any way?
Sure, my order number is 1234567890. The shoes are brand new and I have not worn them outside or caused any damage.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund process immediately. Please ship the shoes back using the prepaid label we will send you.
Thank you for your quick response and the refund solution. I appreciate the prepaid shipping label, this makes the process easier.
We have received your returned shoes and your refund has been processed successfully. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund and that everything has been resolved to your satisfaction.
Since we have not heard back from you, we will now close this refund case. Please contact us again if you need any further assistance.
We have sent you a customer satisfaction survey. Your feedback is important to help us improve our service.
